trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were 3 other sightings in Denver on or around November 11th 2009
Summary: brite light falls and splits and spreads into 4-5 individual lights
divs: Sighting Details..seen the same thing a few other people seem to have reported on here too! I wasnt the only one who seen this!..driving into work around 6:25pm working nights in Aurora CO. turing off Chambers rd. turning west onto a side street I look up and west and seen a brite light falling somewhat fast and then it looked to be in a triangle formation of lights as they get lower they then split wide into what looked to be 4-5 brite balls of light the same size and shape they looked to come pretty low and I pulled off the road but from where I was viewing they went out of site..maybe lasted 10-12 seconds..looked quite unusual..keep your eyes to the skys!..theres something going on!
